comments.body: Would recommend doing something like `# [win and (py35 or py36)]` just to avoid potential issues with Python 3.7 when it comes out. Though this is not a blocker just a suggestion.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +39,43 @@    - glpk
    - vc 9          # [win and py27]
    - vc 14         # [win and py>=35]
    - coincbc       # [unix]
